title: Spicy Roasted chickpea Powder / Pappula podi / Bhuna Chana powder
content: Ingredients: Roasted chickpea/ Pappulu - 1 cup Dry red chillies - 4 (or) Red chilli powder - 1 tb sp Dry coconut powder - 2 Tb sp Garlic - 3 cloves Salt - As per taste Procedure: -- Add all the ingredients in mixer grinder until it becomes smooth powder -- Serve it with Rice and pickle/dosa/idly  Follow us: Facebook Instagram Twitter Google+ Share your comments in below section, I like to know your feedback © 2017- 2018 Ramyarecipes
